DESCRIPTION.TITLE: Global Sourcing
DESCRIPTION.TEXT: The success of an organization depends largely on the capabilities and commitment of its workforce. The execution of projects requires more and more personnel with proven skills that guarantee quality and commitment to results. Sometimes, it is necessary to strengthen the work team, for this Evoluciona proposes global business outsourcing, in-person or remote, as an effective strategy to promote the consolidation of the organization's projects.

WHAT_IS_GLOBAL_PEOPLE_SOURCING.TITLE: What is Global People Sourcing?
WHAT_IS_GLOBAL_PEOPLE_SOURCING.TEXT: One of the main obstacles that some economies face is the lack of professionals in the field of technology, which translates into a problem when companies want to carry out technological strategies to enhance their operations. In Chile alone, in the field of technology, it is estimated that we have a deficit of professionals in the area of 25% to 40%. In this context, Global Sourcing is a strategy that carries out an intensive search and selection of the human talent that companies require, both locally and globally, at competitive prices and with a high quality standard.
